original_text: There were 212 guards for the gates of the temple. Their names were written in the lists of their ancestors, for each village where they lived. King David and the prophet Samuel had chosen their ancestors to do this important work as guards.
korean_text: 택함을 입어 문지기 된 자가 모두 이백열두 명이니 이는 그들의 마을에서 그들의 계보대로 계수된 자요 다윗과 선견자 사무엘이 전에 세워서 이 직분을 맡긴 자라

sentences.original_text: There were 212 guards for the gates of the temple.
Their names were written in the lists of their ancestors,
for each village where they lived.
King David and the prophet Samuel had chosen their ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕과 선지자 사무엘이 그들의 조상들을 선택했는데,

sentences.original_text: to do this important work as guards.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 중요한 경비병 일을 하도록 하였습니다.
